title: Citibank España Presents 'A New Program of Privileges' for Its Citigold Personal Banking Customers
summary: Madrid - Citibank España has designed a new Gold Privileges program for its Personal Banking customers to offer its customers an increasingly exclusive and discerning service.
tag-1: Citibank España Presents 'A New Program of Privileges' for Its Citigold Personal Banking Customers
tag-2: Madrid – Citibank España has designed a new Gold Privileges program for its Personal Banking customers to offer its customers an increasingly exclusive and discerning service.
tag-3: Citigold Personal Banking is an exclusive service offered to those customers holding in excess of €75,000 with the bank. Citigold offers access to comprehensive solutions to cover different financial needs, such as a team of experts that support the personal managers to design a personalized investment strategy or to access investment products from the most prestigious managers in the world, which enables us to maintain the highest levels of objectivity and independence when selecting them.

tag-5: This service also includes immediately blocking and replacing your payment cards and mobile telephone, a 24-hour locksmith service at a reduced price, and a system for recovering personal belongings and lost luggage. A range of services designed for customers that value peace of mind and comfort and that want to travel the world knowing they are covered for any unforeseen eventuality.

tag-9: To ensure that they have immediate access to Citi, these customers are provided with a Citigold personal banking telephone service. It is free of charge, with no waiting time or recorded messages and with managers that specialize in Citigold products and services.
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.

tag-12: Citibank España is the retail banking subsidiary of Citigroup in Spain. It has nearly 800 employees, 45 branches and 1,300,000 cards, which are focused on three activity areas: cards, retail banking and commercial banking.
